column5: Here is a pic of a PIC 15.1 lbs caught by my team mate Ross Robertson of Big Water Fishing Pro Team. You can find more at http://www.bigwaterfishing.com/pro_team.php This was caught in the western basin of Lake Erie. The troll bite is starting to heat up so if you are looking to book a trip I suggest you contact a guide soon as many will already have their wknds spoken for.
Nice fish, what a pig!
MONSTER     Congrats to Ross
What a fat fat walleye. Very nice!
Awesome fish, way to go. Haven't caught a 15 yet but a few 13 and 14's on the BOQ every fall.
holy crap! that is one hell of a beaut! congrats man
That's one hog!
Not a follower of the big fish records, but that is the biggest Walleye I've ever seen. Nice work!
what a hog!!!  erie has an incredible walleye fishery... if anyone's looking for a guide, i highly recommend Jimmy Riggin (http://www.jimmyriggin.com/).
thats a beauty fish
Absolutely sick!
Unreal, what a fish!
Amazing fish...i would definitly get a replica mount of that one!
SLob!
Thats one nice fish! I wonder what the 22lb record looks like.
Like it's 7lbs bigger.   BIG   fish for sure. Beautiful colours as well.
What a fattie. Nice fish
wow, look at the gut on that thing, good job
That really is a pig and a half.
That is a huge Lake Erie walleye!   A guy here Superdad caught a 20 lber on Quinte years ago. Next world record walleye could come from Great Lake waters in Ontario.
